pages.title: Farmer's Set
pages.text: Green thumbs are not immune to the Buddycard craze! Obtaining cards from the Farmer's set requires you to grow Buddybeans, a plant gentically engineered to sell more buddycards. There are a total of 18 cards to collect.

pages.title: Farmer's Medal
pages.text: Upon completing the set, you can use a medal with a Farmer's Card in hand to be granted the Farmer's Medal.

pages.title: The Buddycard Recipe I
pages.text: To get your cards, you will first need to make Buddybeans. These Buddybeans can grow in Farmland to yield more Buddybeans. Despite their origins, they are quite edible!

pages.title: The Buddycard Recipe II
pages.text: Next, cut up the beans at a Cutting Board to get Diced Beans! These are too thin to be edible, but are vital in the Buddycard-making process.

pages.title: The Buddycard Recipe III
pages.text: Combine 4 Diced Buddybeans in a Cooking Pot to make Buddybean Paste. This paste is needed for Buddycards, but also actually has limited application in baking.

pages.title: The Buddycard Recipe IV
pages.text: Finally, combine three Buddybean Pastes, three Shredded Buddycards (obtained via cutting any card at cuttingboard), and one sugar in a pot to obtain a Farmer's Set. Use Canvas to grab cards from pot.
